data.title: Delicious
data.text: I love this place! Excellent food and wonderful service. My dinner (portobello mushroom ravioli and side meatballs) was delicious. The other six members of my party also highly enjoyed their dinners. Highly recommend stopping at this place if you are in the area.

data.title: Amazing manicotti and 5 star service
data.text: Great food and loved the owners! Even though we had a large group, they were timely in their service and were very sweet and welcoming. Highly recommend to anyone!

data.title: Amazing Family Owned Local Resturant
data.text:
I love this place. It is always amazing. The service is phenomenal, the food is delicious, and you get huge portions. Definitely an amazing deal. The atmosphere is great, nice music playing softly in the background and rustic walls with appealing art.

I will come back here whenever possible.

data.title: THE BEST
data.text: Don Vito's is not only the best Italian place in Daytona, but the best Italian in the world. The food there is AMAZING. The service is out of this world. Jimmy and Barbra are the nicest people in this world. They take time to actually sit down and talk with you. If you love Italian food, you'll love Don Vito's. It's better than any other Italian i.e. Zappi's. They made our going away for my "d-dad" special. My family and I have been going to Don Vito's for 5 years and will continue to.

data.title: Always a pleasure!
data.text: My family and I LOVE Don Vito's so much! We go there for every special occasion and plan to go back for my 21st Birthday next month! The always friendly and attentive staff are like a second family to us, and the food is something to look forward to all day! For anyone in the area or that are just visiting I highly recommend this phenomenal dining experience!

data.title: Amazing experience
data.text: Wonderful experience - authentic Italian food with old school service - patience pays off since owners spend quality time with each table. Doesn't get much better than this

data.title: We love Don Vito's!!
data.text:
The food is delicious and plentiful. The hospitality is outstanding! Barb and Jimmy make you feel like you are coming home for the holidays! We go to Florida every year over Christmas and New Year's. 

Last year when were visiting Jimmy had already closed to the public that day and was preparing for a private banquet, when we called and told him we were in town he opened his doors and served us because he knew Don Vito's was one of our son's highlights of the trip. Thank you guys for always going above and beyond our expectations!

data.title: Mike
data.text: What a fine. As soon as we walked in we felt we were eating at someones  home. Music playing old Italian songs. The owners both waited on us which was really fun with their personalities, conversations were very entertaining. We had sausage and meatballs for appetizer, very good. Stuffed shell, lobster ravioli, lasagna and peppers sausage and penne were all very good. The desserts were all excellent. Very good experience....thank you

data.title: Delicious & Entertaining
data.text: Jimmy and Barbara were wonderful. We came for an early dinner and had the place to ourselves for a while. They were so sweet and loved on our 3 month old. Very family friendly. They had 4 tables marked for reservations and the rest of the restaurant was packed by 5:30 with a good mix of locals and newbies. Even a few regulars came in which is always a sign of a good restaurant choice. They had the best Garlic Knots you've had in your life. My husband dipped his pizza crust in the extra garlic butter, it was that good.

data.title: Excellent food
data.text: Their Garlic knots are the undisputed best I've ever had. Barbara and Jimmy are super nice and make you feel at home when you come in. The pizza was excellent and Jimmy and even gave us some tips on other places to try in the area.

data.title: Best Italian food EVER!!!
data.text: We ordered 2 pizzas and the bakes ziti. Pizza was New York style as it should be! The brick oven they use makes the homemade crust absolutely perfect! They make their own sausage and it's delicious and the bakes ziti was like we've never had before. Perfection all around! The owners are the nicest people and made the experience that much more enjoyable. We have found a place to go back to each year we come to Daytona.

data.title: Second visit after an amazing first, sadly very disappointing!
data.text: I'm sooo disappointed... this place was awesome last year. This year's visit was very disappointing. Pizza was actually tasteless and the spaghetti was way overcooked and blah. They were still very friendly but sooo SLOW! We waited almost 30 min for our check alone. It was such a drop from the first visit I don't think it is worth a third. I am deeply saddened as I thought I had a great discovery.

owner_response.author: donvitos, Owner at Don Vito's Italian Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dearest  sjrev – I too am sooooo disappointed about the scenario you paint as well as the rating you chose to apply as it just doesn't fit our usual quality. Yes, there can be a delay checking folks out dependent upon crowds. As far as the pizza and spaghetti are concerned we are bewildered? Reviews ahead and after yours speak of the SAME items and are ALL positive?  ALL our pasta are cooked al dente, [firm to the bite]. Admittedly you did wait awhile for your items for which we can only apologize. We have found that a long wait can severely impact a reviewers comments and some times distort them??  This may be at least part of the case with your visit. You also had some Steak Pinwheels which you took home but, failed to mention. I assume you enjoyed those?? Those are made with the SAME homemade dough and SAME fresh steak as the Pizza you had??? Here's the bottom line. WE apologize for the delay but, as we have stated so many times, if you're not willing to wait, or if your looking for fancy we are not for you. The wait is dictated by the crowds and the fact that EVERYTHING is cooked fresh. Wait times will vary greatly. While we too are deeply saddened by your declaration to NOT return, somehow we will find the courage to persevere and go on!! We too thought we had garnered a great customer?? Enough said - NOW – Go in Peace an May the Force be With You!!  - Perky Lady Barbara – Saddened Owner of that disappointing restaurant serving over cooked spaghetti and tasteless Pizza very SLOOOOOOWLY!!!!  Arrivederci
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dinner
data.text: It was Friday night with only about six people in the restaurant.  The food was good with reasonable prices.  It was served fast and friendly.

data.title: Great Italian restaurant
data.text: Great Italian restaurant and great survice! Was in town and had a pizza and a few apps and a couple of ice cold drinks. No trip to Daytona without going to eat there. Thanks for great time

data.title: BEST ITALIAN FOOD IN FL!!!
data.text: The garlic knots were amazing and garlicky. The small lasagne was the size of their large plate. Jim and Barbara were so nice and made us feel like part of the family. Everything was homemade and absolutely fantastic! What a wonderful dinner!

data.title: Great food and family atmosphere
data.text: Drove from Orlando to Ponce Inlet to see the lighthouse. After that exhausting 203 step climb we built up an appetite and decided to grab a bite at Don Vito's. The staff was very friendly and inviting. We ordered the calzone, the pizza, and portobello mushroom ravioli. Everything tasted delicious and fresh. The best part was that it was piping hot and the prices were very reasonable. We would definitely come back for another visit. Thank you, your new friends from Orlando, FL.

data.title: Family run - they care
data.text: Great restaurant, with authentic Italian dishes.  The food is delicious, the family stays involved at all levels.  The overall apprentice is nothing special - a great value, delicious option directly off international Speedway Blvd.  I will be back the next time I'm in Daytona.

data.title: Awesome food, wonderful hospitality!
data.text: Tonight at Don Vito's, we had one of the best family meals in a restaurant that we've ever had. Jimmy and Barbara (the owners) made us feel at home the instant we walked in. The atmosphere was nice and comfortable, with awesome ratpack style music playing in the background. Every single thing we tried was amazing. We got the Italian sampler as an appetizer. The bruschetta was so unique and flavorful. And the garlic knots! Oh my goodness. Chewy, buttery, garlicky deliciousness! We also got an extra large cheese pizza, which we promptly devoured. And even though we were stuffed to the gills, we ordered the tiramisu, which was out of this world. It was an outstanding meal all around and very reasonably priced. We'll definitely return!

data.title: Wonderful place to eat
data.text: This is a wonderful, friendly place to eat absolutely mouth watering Italian food.  The owners are wonderful and attentive.  Felt like I was at home!!!  Thank you for a wonderful experience!!!!!  We had a great time!!!!!  Mike and RuthAnn

data.title: Great family owned restaurant
data.text: We thoroughly enjoyed our visit.  The garlic knots were delicious, the main courses were tasty and their tiramisu was fantastic.  The owner has his family were incredibly welcoming and friendly.  We will definitely go again when we are back in town.
